query.description:
Filters the events by one of the five category: Accepts one of the following values:
CODING_EVENT
WEBINAR
BOOTCAMP_EVENT
WORKSHOP
ALL_EVENTS

Filters the events by one of the sub-categories:
Upcoming
Archived
All Time Favorites
Numeric value to offset the list of events

request.description: Get list of events on the basis of given filters and params.

response.name: CN Events List

header.value: POST, GET, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS
Access-Control-Allow-Headers, Origin,Accept, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Access-Control-Request-Method, Access-Control-Request-Headers, Authorization
